Name: Emily B
Title: Actually shocked at my results
Description: I added the Bakuchiol Age Delay Serum into my normal routine and the difference in my forehead lines is honestly wild. My skin texture looks smoother and more even. I compared photos from nine months apart and the improvements really kicked in after I introduced this for the last three months.

Name: Jeff Seagondollar
Title: My wife made me try it... she was right
Description: My wife kept telling me to try bakuchiol because retinol always irritated my skin. I finally gave it a shot, and after about three weeks I’m honestly surprised at how much smoother and more rested my face looks. The lines around my eyes aren’t as sharp, and my overall skin just looks healthier without any redness or peeling. Didn’t expect to notice a difference, but it’s legit.

Name: Jaimie R
Title: Didn’t expect this much change tbh
Description: I’m not usually a skincare guy, but hitting my mid-30s made the lines on my forehead show up fast. Retinol was way too harsh for me, so I figured I’d try a gentler option. After about 4–5 weeks with this bakuchiol serum, my skin legit looks smoother and less tense. The texture across my forehead evened out a lot, and those deep-looking creases between my brows softened way more than I expected. My skin tone looks brighter too, not as blotchy. It has a super light, calming tea-like scent that’s actually nice. If you’re sensitive to retinol but want results, this is worth a shot.

Name: Syd M
Title: My favorite gentle anti-aging step
Description: Retinol always irritates my skin but I still wanted something for fine lines. This serum has been the perfect replacement. My under-eye area and cheeks look smoother and my skin tone looks more even. It also has a really soft scent, kind of like lavender tea, which I love at night.

Name: Erin E. Dobbins
Title: If you’re sensitive to retinol, try this
Description: I’m 36 and retinol dries me out no matter how careful I am. This bakuchiol serum gives me the same smoothing effect without the irritation. The lines around my eyes and mouth look much softer. Very happy I switched.

Name: Adil Salam
Title: Noticeable improvement around my eyes
Description: i wasn’t expecting much but the fine lines around my eyes definitely look smoother. Easy to use and no irritation at all. Pleasant surprise.

Name: Alyssa Hackett
Title: Skin feels so smooth
Description: After a few nights of using this, my skin feels softer and my makeup sits better. My forehead lines don’t stand out as much either. Really impressed.

Name: Sanjana
Title: Really works for texture
Description: My skin tends to look dull and uneven, and this helped a lot. My fine lines softened, especially around my eyes. My before and after photos are actually kind of crazy.

Name: Jenny Plinke
Title: Glad I took before photos
Description: The changes were gradual, but when I compared my pictures after two months the difference was obvious. The tiny lines near my eyes looked softer and my overall skin texture improved.

Name: Maggie
Title: Seems promising
Description: I haven’t used it long enough to see major results yet, but my skin feels nice and smooth. No irritation, which is rare for me.

Name: Lindsay M
Title: Texture and discoloration REALLY improved
Description: I’ve tried so many brightening products and none of them helped the blotchy texture and sun spots on my forehead. Retinol always irritated my skin, so I honestly didn’t expect much from this either. But the results are actually impressive. After about 6–8 weeks, my forehead looks way clearer, smoother, and more even-toned. The redness around my nose calmed down too. My whole face looks more refined and balanced. It’s gentle, absorbs quickly, and has a soft lavender-ish smell that I actually love at night. Super happy I gave it a try.

Name: Shelly
Title: Love this in my night routine
Description: Great serum. My skin looks smoother when I wake up and the smile lines around my mouth are less noticeable. It feels super gentle too.

Name: Starboy
Title: Hydrating and smoothing
Description: Using this regularly has made my skin look smoother and more hydrated. My fine lines aren’t gone, but they’re definitely softened. Really solid product.

Name: Autumn L. Malone
Title: Not sure it's for me yet
Description: I’ve seen some softer lines but not a dramatic change. My skin feels smoother though. I’m going to keep using it a bit longer before deciding.

Name: m
Title: tiktok made me try it
Description: i’ve been using it for a few weeks and the tiny lines near my eyes look a little softer. No irritation at all, which is a big win. Hoping for even better results with time.

Name: David
Title: Pretty good so far
Description: The fine lines under my eyes look less harsh and my skin feels smoother overall. Was hoping for a little more, but it’s definitely helping.

Name: Tara V
Title: My skin finally looks smooth and glowy
Description: okay so I wasn’t expecting much because my skin is really reactive and most serums either break me out or make me greasy. but this one ended up being perfect for me. The little bumps and uneven texture on my cheeks smoothed out so much, and my skin looks brighter and fresh. The glow in the after photo is totally real, no makeup. No irritation, no peeling, nothing. Just healthy, smooth skin. It even makes my pores look smaller. This is definitely staying in my routine.

Name: Marisa
Title: Take before and after photos
Description: My skin looks noticeably smoother after about a month of consistent use. The lines near my lips especially look softened. Definitely worth it.

Name: Cindy S
Title: Definitely works
Description: This fits perfectly into my routine. My skin texture is smoother and the lines around my eyes aren’t as sharp. Very pleased.

Name: Kadir Basaran
Title: Fantastic product and service
Description: The serum arrived in perfect condition and feels really high quality. I’ve already noticed smoother texture after consistent use.

Name: Nana
Title: Experimenting has paid off
Description: I was skeptical at first, but after two months the lines around my mouth and eyes look softer. My skin just looks healthier and more rested overall.

Name: Giselle Lucero
Title: I can’t believe it actually works
Description: This made such a difference in the early lines I was starting to see. My skin looks smoother and more even toned. Also the scent is really calming, kind of like a light floral tea.

Name: Lila
Title: Works but you need consistency
Description: It definitely works, but you have to keep using it. If I skip a day, the effect fades a little. My under-eyes look smoother when I stay consistent.

Name: Sinceray
Title: Yes it works
Description: The fine lines around my mouth were starting to bother me, and this has softened them so much. It took a couple weeks, but the results were worth the wait.

Name: Jenny Plinke
Title: Impressive results
Description: When I compared before and after, the lines under my eyes were noticeably less deep and my skin tone looked more even. Really happy with it.

Name: Ravvi A
Title: Surprisingly effective
Description: My forehead looks smoother and my skin feels softer. I wish it worked a little faster on deeper lines, but it’s still doing a great job.

Name: Busenur Temür
Title: Good
Description: My skin feels softer and more nourished. I’ve definitely noticed an improvement in texture.

Name: Patricia Le
Title: Still watching for results
Description: My lips and under-eyes look smoother, but some areas haven’t changed as much as I hoped. Still, the texture benefits alone make it worth using.

Name: Tina Munster
Title: Working so far
Description: i lost some weight in my face and my under-eyes started looking hollow. After a few uses, the area looks softer and not as shadowy. Very promising so far.

Name: Amanda
Title: Highly recommend
Description: My dark circles and fine lines look lighter and my skin feels healthier overall. Really impressed and I’ve barely made a dent in the bottle.

Name: OU812Shelby
Title: Big bottle for the price
Description: Just started using this and the size is generous. It feels gentle and hydrating. Excited to see how well it works long term.

Name: Chloe S
Title: Under eye hollows reduced
Description: My under-eyes look smoother and less hollow after a few weeks. It doesn’t irritate my skin and has a clean, subtle scent. Really impressed.

Name: MB
Title: Does wonders for the skin
Description: I get creasing under my eyes and this softened them a lot. My skin looks fresher in the morning and the texture is noticeably better.

Name: Lovefebe
Title: Saw a little change already
Description: I wasn’t expecting results right away, but after two days I noticed a little extra smoothness. Excited to see where it goes.

Name: Customer
Title: Perfect
Description: The seller fixed a shipping issue for me immediately and the product arrived perfectly. Feels very high quality. No complaints at all.
